registration_successful: Registration successful! Please verify your email.

password_reset_error: An error occurred while resetting the password.
new_password_same_as_old: New password cannot be the same as the old one.
welcome_message_ai: Hello! Upload your files and let's get started.
token_expired: Your password reset link has expired.
chat_room_not_found: Chat room not found or unauthorized.

chat_room_create_failed: An error occurred while creating chat room.
chat_room_deleted: Chat room and its messages deleted successfully.

file_part_missing: No file part in the request.
file_rename_missing_fields: Missing old filename, new filename or chatroom ID.
room_rename_missing_fields: Missing room ID or new room name.
invalid_reset_link: Invalid or expired password reset link.
session_expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
reset_token_invalid: The reset link is invalid or expired.
change_password_error: An error occurred while changing your password.
empty_chat_warning: Chat room is empty. Please upload a file or send a message.
local_password_not_set: A password has not been set for this operation. You cannot set a password because you logged in with Google.
expired_token: Session has expired. Please log in again.
weak_password: The password is not strong enough.
email_exists: This email address is already in use.
file_delete_missing_info: File could not be deleted: Missing information.
file_rename_missing_info: File could not be renamed: Missing information.
chatroom_required: A chat room must be opened first.
link_upload_failed: An error occurred while processing the link.
file_or_chatroom_missing: File or chatroom ID is missing.
file_text_extraction_failed: Text extraction from the document failed.
link_text_extraction_failed: Text extraction from the link failed.
file_already_uploaded: This file has already been uploaded.
file_too_large: File size exceeds the limit of {{maxSize}} MB.
max_file_limit_reached: You can upload a maximum of {{maxFiles}} files to this chat.

chat_creation_failed: Chat room could not be created.
link_already_uploaded: This link has already been uploaded.
you_must_upload_document_first: Please upload at least one document first.
document_required_before_chat: You must upload a document before starting a chat.
file_upload_in_progress: Your document is uploading, please wait
cannot_delete_during_upload: You cannot delete the chat room while uploading.
chatroom_is_processing: The chat room is processing. Please wait.
auto_summary_prompt: Analyze the selected texts. If they are meaningfully related, create a combined summary; otherwise, summarize each one individually
